article.description: — Caleb Hunter had 21 points as Mississippi Valley State narrowly beat Grambling State 67-63 on Monday night.
article.headline: Mississippi Valley St. tops Grambling St. 67-63
article.linkText: Mississippi Valley St. tops Grambling St. 67-63
article.story: ITTA BENA, Miss. -- — Caleb Hunter had 21 points as Mississippi Valley State narrowly beat Grambling State 67-63 on Monday night. Donalson Fanord had 15 points, 12 rebounds and three blocks for Mississippi Valley State (2-20, 2-12 Southwestern Athletic Conference), which broke its four-game losing streak. Terry Collins added 11 points, 12 rebounds and six assists. Leandre Howard had 4 points and five blocks. The Delta Devils had a season-high 12 blocks. Cameron Christon had 18 points and seven rebounds for the Tigers (9-11, 7-6). Sarion McGee added 10 points. The Delta Devils leveled the season series against the Tigers. Grambling State defeated Mississippi Valley State 85-72 on Feb. 1. ------ For more AP college basketball coverage: https://apnews.com/Collegebasketball and http://twitter.com/AP--Top25 ------ This was generated by Automated Insights, http://www.automatedinsights.com/ap, using data from STATS LLC, https://www.stats.com
